name: Wonderland: Gold Saint In Adventure
summary:
Garen, who was in the Twin Wombs of the Holy Kingdom, inexplicably arrived at the mysterious place full of magma when he woke up and also wore a retro knight costume. , is the best thing to do in the future.
Garen exited the Cave of Flames and heard someone calling his name: it was the Cancer Saint, DeathMask. Deathmask was also transported to this strange world when he woke up from his sleep. It was very likely that all the Golden Saints were involved.
The best way to deal with the disease is through a first battle in a different world, Gallon and Dis fought their adventure in the mysterious different world of Fontainebleau. What is the problem? What is the problem? What is the problem?
